description.text: This vicious-looking +1 corrosive sawtooth sabre has a crimson blade and a hilt that appears to be beautifully carved from dark red stone. On command, a corrosive acid with a deep blood-red hue drips from the sabre. Once per day, the wielder of a fuming blood sabre can use vanish â€”typically to approach an unaware victim or flee undetected from the scene of an assassination.
